verses.text: \w For|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* choirmaster. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*. You showed favor \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w Your|strong="H1121"\w* land, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; You restored Jacob \w from|strong="H1121"\w* captivity.

\w You|strong="H7725"\w* forgave \w the|strong="H3068"\w* iniquity \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* people; \w You|strong="H7725"\w* covered \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* sin. Selah

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* withheld \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* fury; \w You|strong="H3605"\w* turned \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* burning \w anger|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* salvation, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w put|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w displeasure|strong="H2740"\w* \w toward|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H7725"\w* \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w angry|strong="H3708"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* forever? \w Will|strong="H7725"\w* \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w draw|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H7725"\w* \w Your|strong="H7725"\w* \w anger|strong="H3708"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H7725"\w* generations?
Will \w You|strong="H5769"\w* not revive us again, \w that|strong="H5769"\w* \w Your|strong="H4900"\w* people \w may|strong="H1755"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H1755"\w* \w You|strong="H5769"\w*?

Show \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w Your|strong="H7725"\w* loving devotion, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* grant \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w Your|strong="H7725"\w* salvation.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* listen \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H5414"\w* speak peace \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* saints; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* return \w to|strong="H3068"\w* folly.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* salvation \w is|strong="H3068"\w* near \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w those|strong="H8085"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* fear \w Him|strong="H7725"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* glory \w may|strong="H3068"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* land.
Loving devotion \w and|strong="H3519"\w* faithfulness \w have|strong="H7138"\w* joined together; righteousness \w and|strong="H3519"\w* peace \w have|strong="H7138"\w* kissed.

\w Faithfulness|strong="H2617"\w* sprouts \w from|strong="H7965"\w* \w the|strong="H7965"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H2617"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* looks down \w from|strong="H7965"\w* heaven.

\w The|strong="H8064"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* indeed provide \w what|strong="H6664"\w* \w is|strong="H6664"\w* good, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* our \w land|strong="H8064"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* yield its increase.

Righteousness \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* before \w Him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* prepare \w the|strong="H5414"\w* way \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* steps.
